description: This file declares the interface and class definitions for the RDKShell plugin, including methods, events, internal classes, and data structures used for managing shell application operations, events, and interactions within the WPEFramework environment.

classes.name: RDKShell
classes.description: Main class providing plugin functionality, managing shell operations, event handling, internal state, and communication with other components.

classes.name: RdkShellListener
classes.description: Listener class implementing event callbacks from RDKShell events, and providing mechanisms to propagate events to the plugin.

classes.name: MonitorClients
classes.description: Internal notification class monitoring client plugin lifecycle events and managing related state.

classes.name: ScreenCapture
classes.description: Implementation of ICapture interface for taking screenshots or capturing screen data.

classes.name: TaskQueue
classes.description: A thread-safe task queue for serializing operations within the shell.

classes.name: PluginData
classes.description: Data structure holding plugin class information.

classes.name: PluginStateChangeData
classes.description: Tracks plugin state changes and manages connection state and launch enablement.

methods.name: notify
methods.description: Dispatches events with associated parameters to registered listeners.

methods.name: pluginEventHandler
methods.description: Handles plugin-specific events received via JSON.

methods.name: launchRequestThread
methods.description: Sends a request to launch a shell application in a separate thread.

methods.name: moveToFrontWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving a client shell to front.

methods.name: moveToBackWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving a client shell to back.

methods.name: moveBehindWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for moving a client shell behind another.

methods.name: setFocusWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting focus to a client.

methods.name: getFocusedWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving the currently focused client.

methods.name: killWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for killing a client process or shell.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding a key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyInterceptsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding multiple key intercepts.

methods.name: removeKeyInterceptWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing a key intercept.

methods.name: addKeyListenersWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding key event listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyListenersWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing key event listeners.

methods.name: addKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for adding key metadata listeners.

methods.name: removeKeyMetadataListenerWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for removing key metadata listeners.

methods.name: injectKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for injecting a key event.

methods.name: getClientsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving list of clients.

methods.name: getZOrderWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving Z order of clients.

methods.name: getBoundsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving bounds of a client.

methods.name: setBoundsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting bounds of a client.

methods.name: getHolePunchWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for retrieving hole punch state.

methods.name: setHolePunchWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for setting hole punch state.

methods.name: enableInactivityReportingWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to enable or disable inactivity reporting.

methods.name: scaleToFitWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper for scaling display to fit.

methods.name: getSystemMemoryWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get system memory info.

methods.name: showFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to show full screen image.

methods.name: hideFullScreenImageWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to hide full screen image.

methods.name: launchFactoryAppShortcutWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to launch factory app shortcut.

methods.name: getKeyRepeatsEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get key repeats enabled status.

methods.name: enableKeyRepeatsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to enable or disable key repeats.

methods.name: setTopmostWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set a shell as topmost.

methods.name: getVirtualDisplayEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to check if virtual display is enabled.

methods.name: getLastWakeupKeyWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get last wakeup key.

methods.name: getLogsFlushingEnabledWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to check if logs flushing is enabled.

methods.name: getEasterEggsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get current Easter eggs.

methods.name: setAVBlockedWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set AV blocked state.

methods.name: getBlockedAVApplicationsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get blocked AV applications.

methods.name: enableInputEventsWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to enable or disable input events.

methods.name: getGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to get graphics frame rate.

methods.name: setGraphicsFrameRateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to set graphics frame rate.

methods.name: hibernateWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to hibernate the system (if enabled).

methods.name: restoreWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper to restore from hibernation (if enabled).

ctags.name: Name
ctags.pattern: /^                virtual const TCHAR* Name() const override { return "ScreenCapture"; }$/
